architectural_notes: User signup/onboarding flow should not require admin authorization for normal end-users (only for admin-specific actions/roles).
known_issues: User account onboarding still prompts for admin authorization even though registration should be simplified.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend onboarding error handling so that if the backend still returns an authorization-related onboarding failure, the onboarding UI shows a clear English message explaining registration could not be completed (without mentioning admin role assignment), and does not display the raw backend error string to end users.

new_feature_requests.summary: Permudah pendaftaran akun pengguna: hilangkan/skip permintaan authorize ke admin saat user signup/onboarding

Fix backend onboarding so a normal user completing onboarding with a valid invite token can be assigned the `#user` role without requiring admin privileges, and without trapping with the error `Unauthorized: Only admins can assign user roles`. Keep the existing behavior for the allowlisted first-admin claim (allowlisted principal can complete onboarding with an empty token).

projectName: Fix user onboarding so registration does not require admin authorization
